english.segment1: Here comes an opening, she's gotta broken wing, If you can feel the sting, Take care of everything, if she can make a scene, I'll show you what I mean
english.segment2: She pack a loaded gun, set fire to anyone, Knows how to make 'em run, She's down on sixth street, she's goin' sixty, She'll show you how to breathe
english.segment3: I don't want to see, I don't want to be, I don't wanna be anyone, anymore, I don't want to fake, I don't want to break, I don't wanna say anything, anymore
english.segment4: Every time you walk away, I wish you'd stay, Instead of pushin' further away, Every time I hear you say, I just need one, to take this pain away
english.segment5: You're a broken wing, not a broken thing, You can heal in time, if you try, It'll be okay, you can walk away, Sweet Julia..
english.segment6: Here comes an opening, he's gotta broken wing, If you can feel the sting, Take care of everything, if he can make a scene, I'll show you what I mean. He packs a loaded gun, set fire to anyone, Knows how to make 'em run, He's down on sixth street, he's goin' sixty, He'll show you how to breathe
english.segment7: I don't want to see, I don't want to be, I don't wanna be anyone, anymore. I don't want to fake, I don't want to break, I don't wanna say anything, anymore,
english.segment8: Every time ya walk away, I wish you'd stay, Instead of pushin' further away, Every time I hear you say, I just need one, to take this pain away. You're a broken wing, not a broken thing, You can heal in time, if you try, It'll be okay, you can walk away, Sweet Julia..
english.segment9: And I won't laugh, I won't look, I won't listen if you just get up, And I won't laugh, I won't look, I won't listen if you just stand
english.segment10: Every time I lie awake, I wish I, could take it all away, Every time my heart breaks, I wish I could make it seem safe...
english.segment11: Every time ya walk away, I wish you'd stay, Instead of pushin' further away, Every time I hear you say, I just need one, to take this pain away. You're a broken wing, not a broken thing, You can heal in time, if you try, It'll be okay, you can walk away, Julia...
